article_title: U.S. Seeks More Troops For U.N.
article_text:
The top U.S. military officer called on representatives of more than 100 countries to step up assistance to United Nations peacekeeping, but stopped short of saying how Washington would raise its own contribution.

Gen. Martin Dempsey is the first chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff to address a U.N. gathering, a sign of the Obama...

twitter.description: The U.S. is appealing to Europe, Australia, Canada and other countries to deploy their troops on United Nations missions.
twitter.title: U.S. Seeks More Troops For U.N.
